timeline.message: Added allowWritesOnUiThread to RealmConfig which allows opting in for async writes launched from the UI thread. The default setting is set to disallow these writes as it cannot guarantee consistency in results.

timeline.bodyText: There is some misunderstanding here. Async transactions don't run on the UI thread, they are only started there, but actually run in a background thread, so this test and implementation is wrong. The only thing that should be disallowed is executeTransaction() (which runs on the same thread).
